articles.title: Scientists reveal one thing that all dead bodies have in common - UNILAD
articles.description: Scientists conducted a study on 36 corpses and analysed how they decomposed.
articles.content:
Scientists have found an unexpected similarity between decomposing bodies.
OK, this might not be your typical topic of conversation for the dinner table - but it's still quite interesting to know.
